 2000-10292000-06-210TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the SHIP STATION (RADIO) REGULATIONS, 1999 which require domestic commercial ships to be fitted with radio equipment that is compatible with the Global Maritime Distress and Safety System, set out the technical and operational requirements for these devices and provide for the repeal of the Ship Station Radio Regulations, effective April 1, 2001.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0260 Publication Date: 2000-07-05
